item.title: MCMC (2) : Exact Monte Carlo Method
item.description: Exact Markov chain Monte Carlo sampling I don’t like the naming. The word exact could mislead us to understand the concept. Anyway I used the word in the title because it was the title of the chapter of the book “Information Theory, Inference, and Learning Algorithms” by David Mackay, which I studied to learn the theory. The different names of it are perfect simulation and coupling from the past. Maybe these are better names.
